member.name: T:Savonia.Web.ErrorReporter.ErrorReporterModule
member.summary: Sends error reports to specified mail recipient(s). Use "ExceptionMailsRecipients" key in appSettings to enable error reporting. Use comma (,) separated list of error report recipients.

member.name: M:Savonia.Web.ErrorReporter.ErrorReporterModule.HandleException(System.Exception,System.Web.HttpRequest,System.String)
member.summary: Handle exception. Send exception message to mail recipients or write to trace log if no recipients are defined.
member.param: Extra information for exception message. Default is empty string.
